meanings.definition: Capable of being broken down into simpler substances.
meanings.sent1: The leaves are decomposable, meaning they can turn into soil over time.
meanings.sent2: Organic waste is decomposable and can be used for composting.
meanings.sent3: The decomposable paper plates started to disintegrate before the party ended.
meanings.sent4: Her decomposable ideas evolved into a brilliant solution.
meanings.sent5: The decomposable plastic bag slowly disintegrated in the sun.

meanings.sent4: His decomposable enthusiasm faded as the project faced challenges.
meanings.sent5: The decomposable wood showed signs of decay after being exposed to moisture.
